title: New Norcia voices (A)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Benedictine Abbey of New Norcia, Western Australia - History
History/Benedictine Abbey of New Norcia, Western Australia - History
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Culture conflict
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Monks - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Monasteries - Australia
description: A companian piece to 'New Norcia' that contributes valuable background information this documentary combines interviews with a monk at the New Norcia monastery, historians, and aboriginal men and women who were brought-up at the mission. Each brings a different perspective to the legend of the founder Bishop Salvado, the legacy of the Mission and what this might mean today.
